summary: Successfully fixed React Error #31 (Objects are not valid as a React child) on remote server. Created safeRender.js utility, fixed BasicInformationForm.js (4 helperText instances), Menu.js (icon and name rendering), ProfileTabPopover.js (menu name with replace), and WalletBoxComponent.js (balance display). All files backed up before modification. Rebuilt Next.js application successfully and restarted PM2 process. All fixes applied and application is running.
current_status: All React Error #31 fixes completed and deployed. Application rebuilt and restarted. Ready for testing. Users should now be able to click Avatar in header and open AccountPopover without React crashes. All object rendering issues have been addressed with safe rendering utilities.
